field.note: Setting this value to 'On', will enable caching for the system and bring the Default Expiry setting into effect.
The method used to store and retrieve cache objects.
The number of cache buckets that will be created to avoid directory size limits. The maximum number of cache directories created for storage will be this number squared.
The length of time a cache entry is valid in seconds. Memcache storage type accepts maximum 2592000 (30 days).

Expire the requested content in the accelerator proxy the specified number of seconds after which it is accessed. When this value is not supplied, the 's-maxage' cache header attribute will not be sent.
Expire the requested content in the browser the specified number of seconds after which it is accessed. When this value is not supplied, the content will expire after the "Default Expiry" period.

Choose the system root URLs for which caching should be enabled. If a root URL has caching disabled then content will be served via that URL. However this will not affect sending cache header for browsers.
